overview:
Cheryl was a gymnast as a kid, and ever since, has been both a workaholic and a perfectionist. Long ago, she began her career as a telecommunications software engineer then went on to serve as the entire tech department at a think tank/startup consultancy. Cheryl is a serial entrepreneur and has bootstrapped and sold several small businesses, learning that there is no better thrill than creating something out of nothing and sharing it with the world. She loves a challenge and truly believes that nothing is impossible.

These days, when not hunched over her laptop, Cheryl is figuring out how to make her dream of sustainable off-grid housing come true.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelor of Engineering and a Minor in Technological Entrepreneurship
